description: The "synthetic.student_clubs" table represents student-led clubs or organizations within an educational institution, with each club identified by a unique "club_id". Key columns include "club_name" for the club's title, "description" for detailing the club's purpose, "advisor_id" for linking to a faculty advisor, and various logistical details such as "meeting_schedule" and "meeting_location". As it stands, the table does not have defined relationships to other tables via foreign key constraints, but it serves as a standalone repository of club information including activity status and timestamps for record-keeping.

columns.name: club_id
columns.description: This column uniquely identifies each club within the student clubs table. Each number assigns a distinct identifier to a club, ensuring differentiation.

columns.name: club_name
columns.description: This column lists various expressive or descriptive phrases, likely representing names or mottos of student clubs or similar organizations. Purpose unclear from available data due to the abstract nature of the sample values.

columns.name: description
columns.description: This column contains detailed textual descriptions or summaries of activities, events, or characteristics associated with student clubs. Purpose unclear from available data.

columns.name: advisor_id
columns.description: This column likely identifies an advisor associated with student clubs, with each integer representing a different advisor. Purpose unclear from available data.

columns.name: meeting_location
columns.description: The column represents descriptions or names of locations where student club meetings are held. Purpose unclear from available data.

columns.name: is_active
columns.description: Indicates whether a student club is currently active or not, defaulting to active status unless otherwise specified. Absence of other information prevents further clarification of purpose.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Represents the date and time when a record of student club activity or membership entry was created. Purpose unclear from available data.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: This column captures the date and time when a record in the student clubs table was last modified. It automatically updates to the current timestamp when changes are made, indicating the most recent update.

indexes.index_definition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX student_clubs_pkey ON synthetic.student_clubs USING btree (club_id)
